meanings.definition: To be like or similar to someone or something.
meanings.sent1: The puppy resembles its mother in size and color.
meanings.sent2: The new painting resembles a beautiful sunset.
meanings.sent3: The cloud resembles a fluffy cotton candy in the sky.
meanings.sent4: Her singing voice resembles a gentle breeze on a summer day.
meanings.sent5: The old house resembles a cozy cottage in the woods.

meanings.definition: To have a similar appearance or quality to someone or something.
meanings.sent1: The twins closely resemble each other in looks and mannerisms.
meanings.sent2: The cake resembles a work of art with its intricate decorations.
meanings.sent3: The messy room resembles a tornado aftermath.
meanings.sent4: His determination resembles a roaring lion ready to conquer.
meanings.sent5: The melody resembles a river flowing gently through the valley.
